entry.title: Pelican to Github pages
entry.summary: Using the Pelican publishing system to create blog on github pages
entry.content:
Following the instructions here: https://rsip22.github.io/blog/create-a-blog-with-pelican-and-github-pages.html I now have a working blog.

The only addition was to create a python3 virtual environment, which was simple enough: python3 -m venv /home/pi/pelican source /home/pi/pelican/bin/activate

About Markdown: https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax
